website_summaries.verdict: Realistic-looking henna tattoo stickers that save you the potential mess of using henna paste. Although some designs are tiny, they are pretty and you get a lot for the price.
pros: Stick-on henna tattoos that aren't messy and apply like stickers, but look like the real deal
Affordable, as you get 6 sheets with numerous designs on each
Customers say these tattoos are great for wearing to artistic or musical events and other special occasions
cons: Mixed opinions on their staying power – some users say they last for days while others found that they peel off easily
Somewhat difficult to apply, plus some of the designs have tiny pieces that are especially challenging

customer_reviews.title: Yess!! Get this! It last so long and it looks so real
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you something I literally thought that this was gonna be those cheap tattoos you get in the laundry Matt but noo!!! They last me about a week and I kept scratching my arm and getting a towel to take it off just to check if it will actually come off but it didn’t literally this is so cool and everyone thought it was real it won’t come off no matter how much you try lol so that’s how you know it’s a good tattoo. The picture I took was after the 4 day
customer_reviews.author: Tatiana

customer_reviews.title: These Tattoos Last a While!
customer_reviews.text: These are great! Mine has stayed on a week, withstood multiple showers, and is only now starting to fade. It looks pretty realistic (the look I was going for) and many asked me if it was real! It was a fun way to try out tattoos without the commitment of a real one. (Photos are from day 1, day 3, day 6, and day 8 consecutively)
customer_reviews.author: CLO

customer_reviews.title: These are great they do last 3 to 5 days if you ...
customer_reviews.text: These are great they do last 3 to 5 days if you don't lotion or oil the area that they are applied to. If you have oily skin they may last less. They are very detailed and a little shiny on the first day after the first shower they look more natural. Apply to a clean and oil-free area for best results. Also, the best place to put them is where you sweat the least. Good luck...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute designs that last a while
customer_reviews.text: They're not bad for the price and they do last a while, trusting you don't have it on your hand where you're washing your hands a lot so obviously it will rub off faster, but if you put it on like your arm or leg, they can last up to like 2 weeks. I was really happy about this purchase. People keep asking me if my tattoos are real lol
customer_reviews.author: Zizzy

customer_reviews.title: Delivered too early...
customer_reviews.text: The product is everything I had hoped and more and as described. I'll be using them for crafting purposes. Although Im always happy when the product gets delivered ahead of time, this time I wish it wasn't on this item. It was a surprise gift but because it got here early...it didn't end up being a surprise. But thank you anyway. I know all are working very hard to please the customers so I can't fault anyone for early delivery because they didn't know. Look forward to using tattoos for what I have in mind and know I won't be disappointed based on what I can see as a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Henrysmom

customer_reviews.title: Good temp tattoos.
customer_reviews.text: These really last. I had it on for 9 days on a trip to Germany and it was still partially visible when I got back. Just wish you could order the one you want and get a card full of that one, instead of all the ones you don't want.
customer_reviews.author: F.E. ArlissTop Contributor: Makeup

customer_reviews.title: I'm in love with these
customer_reviews.text: If I could I would be it 10 stars! I'm in love with these! They will go so perfect for my music festival coming up. I tried one on and it stayed for a good 4days!
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great Tatoos!
customer_reviews.text: These tatoos look beautiful when applied. Due to the delicacy of the tatoos designs special care is essential during application. One applied they look great and they last a long time. Make sure they dry completely before allowing anything to run on them, like clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to put on, transfer is really fast, the tattoos are very crisp they almost look like real tattoos. No bad skin reactions either. Overall high quality especially for the price. It does eventually peel off after several days to a week depending upon location and shower/bath frequency. I would buy these again for sure!
customer_reviews.author: SavvyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Very long lasting
customer_reviews.text: These go on bold and don't come off easily even with showers and scrubbing. Very sturdy tattoos. Looks bit shiny but I put powder over it and looks real-ish. Bold black. Lasted longer than a week through multiple showers
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: Really good company.
customer_reviews.text: I’m updating my previous review, I tried one on and everything was fine, by then i put a small one under my eye & it burned my skin, i had a scab for like a week. They are super cute, idk if i just have sensitive skin or something. But after this, the company contacted my and was really concerned about me and asked if they could send me a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Raceprincess

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful. Bold. Long lasting. Great value.
customer_reviews.text: These were by far one of my favorite temporary tattoos. They were very bold and lasted a long time. I shared them with my coworkers bwcause everyone loved them so much! Very good quality. Would definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Martine

customer_reviews.title: Impressed, long lasting
customer_reviews.text: Great quality tattoo! Went on easily in under 30 seconds with a washcloth. It’s on the top of my foot and does not have any worn areas by day six. Impressed!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These stayed on really well, even in the water. Rubbed off on our pool toys we laid on, and sometimes on our swimsuits when rubbed a lot but otherwise very durable for the cost. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful tattoos!!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful!! Love these! They are just so much fun, and they look so real!! They're great for festivals, going out at night, photo shoots, or just every day wear. Awesome price too!

customer_reviews.title: Easily applied and great test prior to permanent ink.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased to apply prior to having actual tattoos inked. They are Super cute, applied easily and look great! If they fall off tomorrow, I’ll update review but as of tonight, I love them.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and long lasting, my daughter has one on her shoulder that’s still partially there from weeks ago.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Presley

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized and cute
customer_reviews.text: Love these- didn’t understand why there was a note attached that told me to send a text to a # and I’d receive a free item and I did and no response from the text so that was confusing

customer_reviews.title: Great product

customer_reviews.text: Works best if you put talcum powder (baby powder or makeup setting powder) over it as soon as it dries. Let it sit for about 3 minutes, and it will last for about 4-5 days.

I'm super impressed, great variety and stick well, Long Lasting ang Water resistance, Purchase Recommendation!

customer_reviews.title: This was super easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I use tattoos weekly. This was the first time trying 'white' ones. I was a bit skeptical because I have found most blacks and colors are harder to apply and to do not last as long as the gold and silver. This was super easy to apply! Easier than any other color I have used, however it does not last as long. When treated right, gold and silver will typically last a week- a week and a half. The white only lasted 4 days. These are BEAUTIFUL though, so I will add these to my tattoos I currently offer.

customer_reviews.author: meardis kinlaw-wells

customer_reviews.title: Clean area before applying with alcohol, not soap
customer_reviews.text: So! First and foremost! Clean area with alcohol! The first one I placed in this area rolled off within 15 min. I was prepared to write a horrid review, then I realized, Although I had just bathed I didn’t clean with alcohol. I’ve now had this tattoo on for 8 hrs and it looks better than it did when applying. The “shine” has dimmed down a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Sue Gue

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and realistic
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my maternity photoshoot and haven't try them on yet. I must say I am pleased with the quality and its definitely a best value purchase. They look really pretty and realistic. I love the details and I'd probably get more for vacations because I don't have to worry about not being able to take it off.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Fun while it lasts
customer_reviews.text: Had a lot of fun “tattooing” myself (and my kids) with these! VERY easy and efficient application. Depending on the design you choose to apply and the location it lasts between 2-3 days I think. The darker bold designs hopefully lasts at least 5 days. Will buy again for upcoming events this summer lol maybe ones with color.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic quality and a LOT for your money!

product_meta.title: Pinkiou Henna Tattoo Stickers Lace Mehndi Temporary Tattoos for Maverick Women Teens Girls Metallic Tattooing Pack of 6 (black)
feature_bullets: 6 Pack high-quality sheets Henna tattoo Sticker. each measures approximately 6 x 8 inches. Tattoos to suit your every mood you'll find dream catcher , elephants , feathers, mandalas , flowers , butterflies , bracelet tattoos , dandelion , fairy tattoos + beautiful mehndi designs.

PERFECT AS A GIFT or for party favors ,also for pictures! Safe and fun for all ages, including kids & adults, and can be worn anywhere on your body. This series will make you look different, natural, cool and elegant, become the focus of party !
COMPLETELY WATERPROOF. Once applied, these awesome tattoos will not wash off. Show them off at the beach or pool party. Long lasting temporary tattoos, Flash temporary tattoos last 3 to 5 days
EASY TO APPLY &REMOVE:Easy to apply in 10-20 seconds with just water and easily removed by rubbing alcohol, body oil, olive oil.
GOOD LOOKING FOR PARTING:This series will make you look different, natural, graceful and elegant, become the focus of party !
